description._content: DESCRIPTION: Interior of Soon Town Barber shop. Part of a series 26945 + A-C. The barber shop was operated by Soon Town from 1930-1951. He did mole removal and collected whiskey but was not a drinker. The spelling for the name of the barbershop is given as Sun Town in the Vancouver City Directory. VPL Accession Number: 26945 Date: February 5, 1946 Photographer/Studio: Dominion Photo Co. SUBJECTS: Chinese Canadians, Barbershops Location: British Columbia - Vancouver - 420 Columbia Street More information on our historical photograph collection: www.vpl.ca/historicalphotos
